H0.text: who is the presiding officer of legislative council in india. Speaker

H1.text: who is the presiding officer of legislative council in india. President

H2.text: who is the presiding officer of legislative council in india. Governor

H3.text: who is the presiding officer of legislative council in india. Chairman

A4.text: The chairman and Deputy Chairman of the State Legislative Council enjoy the same status of Cabinet Ministers in the state.

A5.text: These members elect the chairman and Deputy Chairman of the State Legislative Council.
